definition: to refuse to say anything about (idiom)/to remain tight-lipped/to avoid mentioning
to close/to stop up/to shut/to obstruct
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: A Unicom spokesperson declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 一位中國聯通發言人對此閉口不談。

sentences.english: It's difficult to turn on local radio or TV without hearing about pot.
sentences.chinese: 要讓當地的廣播電視節目閉口不談藥罐也絕非易事。

sentences.english: That restraint was driven partly by fear.
sentences.chinese: 對匯率閉口不談一部分是出於恐懼。
